name: 2D Shooter (vplima)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter made for the final assignment of the section 2D Shooter for the Game Development course from MSU. I did the following modifications:

  1. Added a life counter and a health bar in the player HUD
  2. Added two kinds of powerups
    1.  a powerup to add a life 
    2. a temporary powerup to temporary boost the player speed and fire rate
  3. Added three levels following a logical progression
    1. the first one only has shooters and has many lifes to be gained, to familiarize the player with the game
    2. the second one has shooters and chasers, and doesn't have a lot of extra lifes, to challenge the player a bit more
    3. the third one is pure madness, with many enemies and a low supply of lifes and boosters

Credits
